name: survey-wizard
description: Reverse Resources Survey wizard for brands (Supplier version)

scripts.lint: cd api && npm run lint && cd .. && cd ui && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd api && npm run lint:fix && cd .. && cd ui && npm run lint:fix
scripts.test: cd api && npm run test:e2e && cd .. && cd ui && npm test
